remarks: Less-than-or-equal-to in terms of join.  ( ~ chlejb2 analog.) (Contributed by NM, 14-Nov-2011.)
statement:
latlej.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
latlej.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
latlej.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
latleeqj2 $p |- ( ( K e. Lat /\ X e. B /\ Y e. B ) -> ( X .<_ Y <-> ( Y .\/ X ) = Y ) ) $.
